snippet: Roger Federer will play at the Monte Carlo Masters next month in a strong field featuring nine of the 10 best players in the world....
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer will play at the Monte Carlo Masters next month in a strong field featuring nine of the 10 best players in the world.

headline.print_headline: Federer to Play in Strong Monte Carlo Masters Field
headline.main: Federer to Play in Strong Monte Carlo Masters Field
